title: American icons are gone?
body:
When did they take them off? And will they be coming back anytime soon? 

Wanted to get a cloud 9 or clg icon :/

replies.body:
Hey Eric Share,

These icons were removed on September 1st. Unfortunately, I don't have info on when they'll be returning.
In my country, I'm an American, lower case doesn't fly here.
I corrected myself sir, now can you answer my quesiton?
